entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:53 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:53 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:53 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
